author: kdy1
message:
perf(turbopack): Update `modularize_imports` (#79012)

### What?

Update `modularize_imports` to reduce memory pressure and possibly reduce the RSS.

### Why?

We should apply https://github.com/swc-project/plugins/pull/449

### How?

 - Closes SWC-648

files.patch:

  "httpdate",
  "itoa",
  "pin-project-lite",
- "socket2 0.4.9",
+ "socket2 0.5.8",
  "tokio",
  "tower-service",
  "tracing",
@@ -4329,9 +4329,9 @@ dependencies = [
 
 [[package]]
 name = "modularize_imports"
-version = "0.83.0"

  "convert_case",
  "handlebars",

- "vergen 9.0.5",

 ]
